FuncDef:
The inter-area-segmented enable command enables the support for inter-area tunnel segment on VPN ingress nodes.
The undo inter-area-segmented enable command disables the support for inter-area tunnel segment.
By default, the VPN does not support inter-area tunnel segment function.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family MVPN view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the inter-area-segmented enable command on the ingress node of VPN tunnel, the NG MVPN supports tunnel segment in inter-area scenario.
Prerequisites
The multicast function is enabled on the VPN.
